name: JD Thomas

s001p003s00011706e00015723.question_text: Tell me about your family growing up.

s001p003s00020619e00030207.question_text: When you were a kid, what did you want to be when you grew up?

s001p003s00031327e00042817.question_text: What kind of student were you?

s001p003s00044005e00054513.question_text: What was your home life like?

s001p003s00080610e00083600.question_text: When did you start working with the Navy?

s001p003s00090803e00091228.question_text: Are you currently serving in the military?

s001p003s00100527e00101009.question_text: What is your current position now?

s001p004s00022420e00025321.question_text: What position did you play in football?

s001p004s00040819e00043511.question_text: How do you track all your tasks?

s001p004s00092417e00114220.question_text: Why didn't flight school work out?

s001p005s00005703e00012717.question_text: How do you set the tone as a leader? What is the right tone?

s001p005s00014818e00024016.question_text: What are the most common mistakes you've seen new leaders make? (e.g., skipping steps)

s001p005s00025508e00033204.question_text: What problems need to be rooted out early, or you'll have trouble fixing them later?

s001p005s00035909e00050121.question_text: How much leadership should you take charge of versus letting your senior petty officer lead?

s001p005s00053118e00063718.question_text: How do I balance being close with my team versus fraternizing?

s001p005s00065604e00075612.question_text: What are the main things that a new leader must learn and adjust to?

s001p005s00084804e00095223.question_text: How have your priorities changed as your career progresses?

s001p005s00101220e00112403.question_text: What does it take to really make a change in a team?

s001p005s00114321e00123723.question_text: How has your view of this line of work changed over time?

s001p005s00130415e00145528.question_text: What priorities would you recommend for a person entering this field?

s001p005s00150901e00154724.question_text: What skills do you wish you had mastered before entering your profession?

s001p005s00155627e00170219.question_text: What is one question you wished you asked earlier?

s001p005s00171717e00184505.question_text: As a leader, how much more will I know about the overall goals of the work I am doing?

s001p005s00193109e00203206.question_text: What was the most difficult part of your training?

s001p005s00222312e00232508.question_text: You are having a conflict in the first few days in your platoon, is that normal or no?

s001p005s00250228e00264207.question_text: What are some good resources to look at before starting (books, videos, classes)?

s001p006s00011104e00014411.question_text: How do you spend most of your time at work?

s001p006s00043008e00044700.question_text: What was your first major leadership role?

s001p006s00072402e00085613.question_text: Describe the work you did on a typical day.

s001p006s00091514e00102203.question_text: Describe the physical environments in which you've worked.

s001p006s00103313e00110217.question_text: How many hours do you work in a typical week?

s001p006s00111302e00121616.question_text: What kinds of decisions do you make in your career on a daily basis?

s001p006s00123923e00141016.question_text: What kinds of problems do you deal with?

s001p006s00145412e00171915.question_text: What is a story that really shows what it is like working in your job?

s001p006s00173128e00175420.question_text: What are the major benefits of doing this kind of work?

s001p006s00180212e00184920.question_text: What are the major negatives of doing this kind of work?

s001p006s00200114e00211905.question_text: How much travel do you do in a year?

s001p006s00212824e00223827.question_text: Why do you love your job?

s001p006s00225224e00233304.question_text: What gets romanticized about your career field that really isn't that great?

s001p006s00234108e00244020.question_text: What are some of the common misconceptions about your field?

s001p006s00245417e00252416.question_text: What do you do now that is different from what you thought you would be doing?

s001p006s00253911e00262502.question_text: How did your work day change over your career?

s001p006s00264611e00284102.question_text: Where did you have to move in your career, and how did that change things each time?

s001p006s00285919e00293620.question_text: Where do you see yourself in 5 years? 10?

s002p001s00034420e00035720.question_text: What's your favorite book of all time? Why?

s002p001s00040414e00041504.question_text: What's your favorite movie of all time? Why?

s002p001s00042401e00044925.question_text: If you could meet anyone in the world today, who would it be and why? What would you say to that person?

s002p001s00045726e00051510.question_text: What person do you most admire and why?

s002p001s00070320e00070626.question_text: What is your least favorite food?

s002p001s00080611e00081204.question_text: What is the best military perk you experienced?

s002p001s00121609e00125820.question_text: What was the coolest thing you did in the Navy?

s002p001s00135128e00144112.question_text: What have you done that got a lot press?

s002p002s00010515e00012605.question_text: How can you lead by example? (What specific things do you do?)

s002p002s00013600e00020914.question_text: What are some tips to earn the trust of my team?

s002p002s00021901e00030318.question_text: How do you connect more deeply with your team members?

s002p002s00045503e00060218.question_text: What are good strategies to have the right kind of presence with my team?

s002p002s00061528e00064728.question_text: How do you and your work colleagues socialize outside of work?

s002p002s00071214e00080819.question_text: How should your relationship be with your subordinates (close vs. far)?

s002p002s00082623e00094711.question_text: How do I help my team prepare for a tough mission (e.g., inspection, long mission)?

s002p002s00095626e00114209.question_text: What kinds of people should I use certain leadership strategies with?

s002p002s00133513e00144105.question_text: How do I push my team to meet the standards (if they are having trouble meeting them)?

s002p002s00144903e00152207.question_text: How should you reward your sailors for good performance?

s002p002s00153206e00162804.question_text: What qualifications do you look for when interviewing new team members?

s002p002s00163601e00180506.question_text: How should your relationship be with the people in charge of you?

s002p002s00185225e00194619.question_text: What would you advise a person in this field to get to know their bosses?

s002p002s00200015e00213106.question_text: How do you get good feedback from supervisors?

s002p002s00234014e00245122.question_text: What are ways you can identify the strengths and limitations for each member of your team?

s002p002s00252328e00261520.question_text: How is it different to manage military people vs. civilians in the military?

s002p002s00262328e00282205.question_text: What is the difference between working in the public vs. private sectors?

s002p002s00283027e00294606.question_text: What makes the navy different than other branches of the military?

s002p002s00295526e00313302.question_text: Describe an experience that illuminates (Navy) culture.

s002p002s00321119e00340921.question_text: How do you help morale? (e.g., when the crew was supposed to go home but needs to stay active/at sea)

s002p002s00342410e00351008.question_text: Who are the core team members (inner circle) who you relied on as a leader?

s002p002s00353105e00364302.question_text: If you have trouble listening well, what strategies can help you to listen well?

s002p003s00004728e00005905.question_text: What makes your leadership style unique?

s002p003s00011218e00013816.question_text: What are some of the things you do really well as a leader that someone could imitate?

s002p003s00015918e00025613.question_text: What are the most important decisions that you face daily as a leader in your organization?

s002p003s00035121e00050803.question_text: What do you need to know about yourself to lead a team?

s002p003s00051528e00055506.question_text: What do you need to know about your team members?

s002p003s00061516e00063907.question_text: What are the most important factors about a situation to consider?

s002p003s00065401e00072717.question_text: What are some secret-sauce tips for your leadership style?

s002p003s00073528e00075904.question_text: What leadership strategies are dying out?

s002p003s00093514e00100817.question_text: What are warning signs for problems in a team?

s002p003s00103014e00110300.question_text: How can you enforce the honor code?

s002p003s00111228e00115421.question_text: How should I handle people who can't meet their standards?

s002p003s00120724e00125910.question_text: What kinds of sailors cause problems in a team and what can you do to improve it?

s002p003s00130628e00134810.question_text: How do you get to the root of a problem with a team member?

s002p003s00135619e00143428.question_text: When is breaking the rules okay?

s002p003s00163706e00170003.question_text: How can I tell when someone can be influenced versus someone who won't change?

s002p003s00175806e00192118.question_text: What conduct issues can mean serious problems if you handle them in-house?

s002p003s00194427e00205509.question_text: Tell me about a time where your priorities conflicted with the priorities of your management.

s002p003s00210628e00220417.question_text: Tell me about a situation where your team and you had a major disagreement about how to handle something.

s002p003s00221523e00230614.question_text: What kind of risks do you need to take in this field?

s002p003s00232001e00241114.question_text: What problems or warning signs should you not try to solve and refer up to specialists instead?

s002p003s00242322e00250528.question_text: What do you do when given an impossible situation due to failures that you didn't cause?

s002p003s00251718e00263912.question_text: How do you deliver bad news, such as a family emergency?

s002p003s00264918e00271419.question_text: Why do people leave the Navy?

s002p003s00291116e00303812.question_text: What else do I need to know?

s002p005s00005800e00013412.question_text: How long does it take to complete your training for OOD (officer of the deck) underway?

s002p005s00024625e00033718.question_text: What advice do you have for someone trying to complete training like OOD underway?

s002p005s00035302e00051320.question_text: What challenges did you face and how did you overcome them?

s002p005s00093228e00101421.question_text: What is the most challenging part about your job?

s002p006s00074021e00082824.question_text: Do you have a significant other?

s002p006s00084411e00093325.question_text: How much free time do you have in your career?

s002p006s00123220e00131227.question_text: How often do you take work home with you?

s002p006s00132224e00141012.question_text: Does being a leader give you flexiblity to alter your work schedule?

s002p006s00142621e00145723.question_text: How does being a leader change your lifestyle? (frequent travel, irregular hours, family difficulties etc.)

s002p006s00163317e00174622.question_text: How do your command responsibilities affect your style in personal life?

s002p006s00175920e00185800.question_text: What is a good approach for selecting a new duty station in terms of finding an area for my family to live in?

s002p006s00190818e00202701.question_text: What are the things I should prioritize when picking housing?

s002p006s00220228e00240521.question_text: What options do you have to transfer or change if you or your family needs it?

s002p006s00242401e00251925.question_text: How will my relationship with my friends or family members be affected if I take a difficult assignment, and what advice should I give them?

s002p006s00253600e00265308.question_text: How early should I get my family involved in the process of planning my next career step?

s002p006s00270510e00281213.question_text: What has been your favorite place to live? Why?

s002p006s00282514e00291701.question_text: What is an example of a conflict you had between your career and family life? How did you learn from it?

s002p006s00292907e00304725.question_text: How do you manage both career and family effectively?

s002p006s00310001e00324910.question_text: What should I get ready to live overseas?

s002p006s00342425e00361401.question_text: What resources should I look for when I know I am moving to a location?

s002p006s00362528e00372202.question_text: What kind of things may fall between the cracks when moving?

s002p006s00400408e00413619.question_text: What should I get ready before I deploy?

s002p006s00414411e00425605.question_text: How do you stay in touch with family?

s002p006s00430710e00445524.question_text: How do you ensure your family is taken care of when you are away?

s002p006s00450507e00462316.question_text: What is the best plan for if your family has an emergency and you are away?

s002p006s00470300e00484128.question_text: What is military vacation like? (length, accural rate, types of leave, etc.)

s002p006s00501519e00505928.question_text: What is the best way to be happy with your time in the service?

s002p006s00511819e00521923.question_text: What habits from military leadership are helpful or problematic?

s002p007s00061024e00075500.question_text: What is the biggest failure you ever had and what did you learn from it?

s002p007s00082710e00091304.question_text: What are the failures for which you are the most unhappy?

s002p007s00092802e00095423.question_text: How accepting of failure is this work environment when a good and honest effort was made?

s002p007s00104305e00114007.question_text: What are sources of support when you took a chance and the result was poor?

s002p007s00121709e00132828.question_text: How does someone recover from a professional "bump in the road"?

s002p007s00133828e00142706.question_text: What was a pivotal moment in your career/life?

s002p007s00165217e00190809.question_text: What's the biggest risk you've taken in your career?

s002p007s00203823e00215815.question_text: What is the most dangerous thing you've ever done on the job?

s002p007s00222206e00233204.question_text: What causes the most stress in your job?

s002p007s00233913e00251725.question_text: How do you deal with stress on the job?

s002p007s00264623e00280004.question_text: What is a trick that you use to keep stress from boiling over?

s002p007s00285621e00290814.question_text: How do you handle self doubt?

s002p007s00324407e00332612.question_text: How do you handle fatigue at work?

s002p007s00334803e00342917.question_text: How do you ensure that boring work gets done well?

s002p007s00344304e00354726.question_text: How do you deal with an increase in operations tempo?

s002p007s00363614e00373025.question_text: What are common crimes people in your field commit that need to be watched for?

s002p007s00392106e00395415.question_text: What part of your future are you most worried about?

s002p007s00403728e00412700.question_text: What worries do you have about your professional future?

s002p007s00420504e00430304.question_text: If you could change one thing about your job, what would it be?

s002p007s00440324e00443917.question_text: What used to be your biggest weaknesses?

s002p007s00464121e00490208.question_text: Describe a time that you were put into an untenable ethical situation?

s002p007s00502112e00513412.question_text: How do I deal with an assignment that I don't like or that isn't a good fit?

s002p007s00521111e00530216.question_text: What things are there for me to do on a ship?

s002p008s00010102e00014822.question_text: Where have you been in port?

s002p008s00021418e00040802.question_text: Where were you stationed and what was it like there?

s002p008s00044400e00063025.question_text: What things should I prioritize when moving to a new location?

s002p008s00105401e00115808.question_text: When do you get to choose if you are going to live in post or off post?

s002p008s00122010e00130815.question_text: When do you need to find your own housing?

s002p008s00132326e00160325.question_text: When should I own or rent?

s002p008s00191603e00204917.question_text: What types of services are easy to find vs. hard to find on a Navy base?

s002p008s00231401e00243620.question_text: How often will I have to move?

s002p008s00260420e00265926.question_text: Can you use outside communication on a deployment, like using the internet and email, calling by phone, and writing mail?

s002p008s00273717e00285713.question_text: Can you drink alcohol when deployed?

s002p008s00292509e00304809.question_text: What have you seen people spend a bonus on that worked out well?

s002p008s00323919e00341704.question_text: What kind of lifestyle can I afford as a junior officer without going into debt?

s002p008s00352306e00370210.question_text: How do taxes work in the military?

s002p008s00371916e00394128.question_text: When do I need to worry about retirement?

s002p008s00425809e00454727.question_text: What do I need to do to plan for my family in the event something happens to me?

s002p008s00461328e00483321.question_text: What benefits should I take advantage of more?

s002p008s00531607e00542101.question_text: What kind of hobbies do you have time for?

s002p009s00112925e00114226.question_text: What types of questions can I ask you about?

s002p009s00123424e00141008.question_text: What happens if you attrit or a particular officer path doesn't work out?

title: NPS Student, Lieutenant, AOPS and ASWO

_FEEDBACK_: I do not want to speculate about the future.
this changes pretty quickly. So what I tell you today might not be true. Tomorrow I'm gonna recommend talking to someone local who might know more.
_INTRO_: I'm Lieutenant J. D. Thomas. I'm here at the Naval Postgraduate School pursuing a master's degree in financial management. Prior to coming to MPs, I was the A ops and the as well for a desert on staff in Mayport, Florida Prior to my second tour, I was four deployed on the USS Lassen and you Kuska Japan as the repair officer and the C E Devil. I was there for about 20 months, and my first tour probably was the most challenging tour today. There was a lot of ups and downs of my division. My division was composed of about 27 personnel. We had a couple of newly frakked first classes, so it was a lot of junior sailors. So we all had a huge learning curves like You get around together, of course, being in damage control and owning the all the fire equipment, the toilets, sinks and everything. You know, of course, things break and you know you're responsible for that kind of stuff. So it's nonstop 20 months tour, so I felt very challenging, but at same time is very rewarding. Prior to reaching the USS Lassen, I was enlisted for two years as a undesignated airman in a Halo squadron out in Jacksonville, Florida HSM 70 um prior to enlisting, served as a ah therapist in a rehab center in one of the local hospitals back where I'm from in Georgia. Oh, in which I had earned my bastards degree from Georgia Southern University.

Lieutenant Jeremy D. Thomas are. Everyone calls me J. D. I'm a lieutenant in the United States Navy. I'm here at the Naval Postgraduate School. I have a bachelor's degree from Georgia Southern University and Statesboro, Georgia. I'm from Georgia. Prior to arriving at Naval Postgraduate School, I was the anti submarine warfare officer on Dez Ron Staff and Mayport, Florida. And prior to that, I was the first tour division officer on the USS Lassen and you Cousteau, Japan.
_OFF_TOPIC_: That's a good question, but I want to make sure I tell you something.
I don't really have an opinion on that.
it would help if you could keep the questions short and simple.
I don't know who that is.
I'm not going to talk about.
I'm not here to talk about that.
I don't have enough information to talk about that.
I do not have an answer for that.
That's a great question. Unfortunately, I've never recorded an answer for that.
That's a great question. I wish I thought of that.
That's a great question. Unfortunately, I don't have an answer right now.
Unfortunately, I was never asked that question.
you might have to ask me something else.
_PROFANITY_: could you please refrain from using?
you might have heard about Swing like a sailor, but it could hurt your career.
_PROMPT_: Here's something you should really know.
I'll see you didn't ask anything there.
You've got to ask me something to get it.
What do you want to talk about?
What would you like to ask me?
What do you want to know?
What do you want to know about me?
What do you want to know about leadership?
you could ask for tips about your first month as a leader.
you could ask me about my go to leadership strategy.
you could ask me about getting a life set up after a big move.
you could ask me about serious problems like sexual harassment or suicide risks.
you could ask me about my job in the Navy.
you could ask me about my background.
go ahead after me about who gave me the best advice in my career.
I did a lot of technical training in the Navy, so you can ask me about what skills I learned.
I haven't always made perfect decisions. You can ask me about any other failures I've had.

I might have covered this already.
